title: Lowest Bribery Incidence Among Firms
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Lithuania reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, showcasing a remarkably low level of corruption in business operations.

title: Universal Formal Business Registration
description: As of 2019, 100% of firms in Lithuania were formally registered when they began operations, indicating a robust regulatory environment for businesses.

title: High Statistical Performance in Data Products
description: Lithuania achieved a score of 94.31 in the Statistical Performance Indicators for Pillar 3 data products in 2023, reflecting a strong capability in data management and dissemination.

title: Minimal Male Primary School Dropout Rate
description: In 2021, only 0.0289% of male children of primary school age were out of school in Lithuania, highlighting a nearly universal primary education for boys.

title: Low Number of Male Children Out of School
description: In 2021, only 17 male children of primary school age were not attending school, emphasizing Lithuania's commitment to education.
